mean_cn: v. 使……年轻；使……恢复精神；变年轻；  vi. 返老还童，恢复活力，复原
mean_en: to make somebody/something look or feel younger, more lively or more modern
sentence: I rejuvenated the flower by giving it enough water and sunshine.
sentence_trans: 我给花提供了充足的水和阳光，让它又重新恢复了生机。
word_etyma: re重新 + juven年轻 + ate动词后缀 → 重新年轻 → 使返老还童
